summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5865 for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, (East Side Only), from Spokane Street to Hanford Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77259, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
